event.title: Sunday Brunch
event.description:
BYG SUNDAYS are here!!!

It may have been a long wait, but the pictures speak for themselves.

Sundrunch - The art of daytime drinking is a beautiful work of vibrancy and precision, pieced together to celebrate the joy of Sundays.

UNLIMITED premium liquor including the likes of Grey Goose and Bombay Sapphire touched with homemade tinctures to create unique cocktail sours and swizzles will make sure it's a #BygSunday

Colours of the nature will come out to play in an elaborate fair of luscious food and invigorating cocktails. Join us as Byg Brewski Brewing Company - Hennur launches its much awaited Sunday brunch

For reservations, call +91 80 39514766

event.title: Beer Stories- Introducing the Byg Kokum
event.description:
The Byg Kokum is a citrusy, light to medium bodied, slightly salty brew. The kokum adds a pleasant tart mouthfeel to the beer. Whiff that wonderful kokum aroma as the beer warms!

Limited Batch! Grab your glass of bright summer freshness today!

review.review_text: Nice ambience. We had our office party here. Good music. Decent food. Cocktails were nice. Courteous staff. A nice place for hosting parties

I came across Bier library on zomato and since then I had been wanting to go and check this place out. I absolutely loved my time here. The ambiance is soooo good! The food and beer is what stole my heart. I would highly recommend this place.

Nice place to visit over the weekend with friends and family. Food was quite ordinary. Nothing stood out from what we ordered. Staff was efficient and courteous. Must try their brewed beers  Food 3.5/5 Service 4/5 Ambience 4.5/5 Value for money 3.5/5

Great place, love their presentation of food. Music is good. Love the ambience. Personally I find the service uneven. Some are great and some are okay. But overall a great place to go with your friends for a chill evening.

Had the beer taster tray at @thebierlibrary 🍻  The tray consisted 100 ml for each beer mentioned below: Very weises- Wheat beer with flavours of banana & clove. Further Lager- Malty Munich lager with a malty aroma & a mild noble hop character. Wittle-wit- full bodies, mildly phenolic & spicy wheat beer with a fruity aroma with the flavour of coriander and orange peel. Phase-Stout- A medium bodied stout with notes of roasted coffee & dark chocolate. Ment-ale-ity - Truly potent ale GooRooAIPA - Beer with tropical flavours of Australian and American hops. Ale-o-drama - A dark, full bodies beer with hints of grapefruit & guava and heavy use of American hops.  Futher lager and Wittle-wit being my personal favourites from this place.   Loved the food too. Had pasta, spagetti and pizzas.

location.address: 4121, LR Arcade, Old Airport Road, Bangalore

review.review_text: #goodfood #music #ambience It is good to see when staff go over and above of what is expected out of them..Prashant - Is definately one of them..!! Thanks for making this experience as rocking one!!
Amazing place and good beer with friendly staff We ordered the chicken and veg starters which were equally good Served by Tapan who was courteous and an amazing staff Had an amazing experience

Beer was really good, specially the guy who has tkwne care of our menu was really professional and had all the required expertise to handle the customer. Tapan was really at this job to serve the customer and he is really good!

Really nice ambience. The food was very good. But more than everything the locally brewed beverage was really nice. Had a nice time with my friend. The host Prashant took care of us real good. Recommended.

We have been in big pitcher tonight with my couple of friends it’s was just awesome experience.   Had a great time they have got brilliant quality food and drinks specially thanks to mr. Prasanna and Sushil who made our visit worth

favoriteRestaurants.name: The Bangalore Cafe

location.address: 4, KH Road, Double Road, Shanti Nagar, Bangalore

favoriteRestaurants.cuisines: Modern Indian, North Indian, Pizza, Continental, Beverages
favoriteRestaurants.timings: 12 Noon to 12 Midnight (Mon-Thu), 12 Noon to 1 AM (Fri-Sun)

review.review_text: After so many great reviews of this place I thought of visiting ,It is great place for vegetarian people those who have craze of exploring & tasting new items  The great ambeince & the staff are polite , the way of presting the food is awesome .I myself had been there I had tasted as  stater : chatpate cones , masala corn & baby corn in stick ( one should try definitely)  Then in main course: ball sauce spagatti, aavd ki biryani (♥️ best biryani till now) , Thai curry (great taste) , Black pav bhaji ( it was ok ) ,chefs nutty noodles ( was nice )  Dessert : coffee rasmalai ( I myself have a huge craze of rasmalai but here this was mind-blowing) one should at least try to have this  *NOTE : on weekends plzz book the table as it is completely packed so to avoid waiting  Overall a nice place to spend time with family and friends  Quality : 4.5/5 Quantity :4/5 Money worth : 4/5

This is a beautifully done place situated in one of the busiest areas of Bangalore. It has both indoor and outdoor seating and is very spacious. It’s a pure veg cafe and serves a huge variety of food with lots of twist. The service is very quick and prompt and the waiters are polite, attentive and quite helpful. We tried quite a few items on the menu but, some were really good. What we liked the most was Tandoori Broccoli, Pineapple and Pav Bhaji. They serve some really awesome mocktails as well. The Desserts are again quite interesting and we loved the Coffee Rasmalai the best. The flavour of coffee was quite dominant and tasted really delicious. This is a great place to have awesome food and spend quality time with your friends and family. This is a must visit place. Highly recommend 👍🏻
Been here twice and both the times food was amazing. Staff were friendly and courteous. I would totally recommend this place and wouldn't mind visiting it again.
Great place for Veggie folks, Mr Soravv is ready to pick up your order!🙂  Great food and really enjoyed food recommend by Sorav. Thanks mate hade great time!!!👍🏻

Lunch here a Saturday.  It's a Vegetarian's Paradise.  If you are a person who loves to pampered with service and great ambience, you should be here and sit in the garden area.  I tried a lot of dishes. The presentation of food is amazing.  I loved the special litti, Veg Biryani, Red Velvet Salad, Tandoori Cigars, Watermelon Cheese, the Broccoli grill was amazing.  Sitting in the Garden area is a great idea. The dessert to special mention.  All the desserts were amazing. The Sugar content is just the right. Because you cont feel it to be over loaded on your tongue. The special Coffee Rasmalai is a must try here.  Would love to visit again for veg meals
